cause.description:
FASHION WITH SOUL!!!
"TELL A FRIEND..2 TELL A FRIEND!!!
ROCK COUTURE CARES!!!
Everyone has been directly or indirectly effected by crime!
Our WORLD has become GANGSTARS PARADISE/THE VORTEX OF INSANITY and PALUKERVILLE:
"TELL A FRIEND 2...TELL A FRIEND!!!"
JOIN BORN 2 B FAMOUS!"PLAYERS ONLY" THE EXCLUSIVE & PREMIER VVIP A-LIST CELEBRITY AND SUPERMODEL DIAMOND GLOBAL NETWORKING CLUB ON FACE BOOK!!! STRICTLY LIMITED INNER CIRCLE EXCLUSIVE MEMBERSHIP!!!
Type "I LOVE ROCK N ROLL"and a controversial comment on my "STREET CREDIT" GRAFFITI WALL OF FAME @ the bottom of my FACEBOOK HOME PAGE and UNITE you support for"STEPHGFASHION.COM,BIG BUSINESS,WORLDWIDE CELEBRITIES & 24-7 SUPERMODELS APPOSING GLOBAL VIOLENT TERRORISM & STREET CRIME!!!"
Dedicated to those that were so sencelessly silenced in LONDON 07/07 & NEW YORK 9/11 and in loving memory of my dear friend Brett Goldin & Fashion Designer Richard Bloom in South Africa who were EXECUTED as a result of VIOLENT STREET CRIME!!!
VOICE YOUR SUPPORT NOW!!!!!!....AND BE HEARD!!!
1. ROCK COUTURE CARES!!!
2. FASHION WITH SOUL!!!
3. REBELS "WITH" A CAUSE!!!
4. ANARCHY
5. VIGALANTES
6. STATE OF EMERGENCY
7. "WHAT U DO IN LIFE...ECHOES IN ETERNITY!!!
cause.mission: "UNITE AGAINST GLOBAL TERRORISM & VIOLENT STREET CRIME!!!"
cause.name: "SURRENDER YOUR WEAPON...PLAY YOUR ELECTRIC GUITAR!"
